history.title: Product Management
history.description: At one of Fast Company’s most innovative companies, I am a member of the product management team working on LeafLink’s B2B marketplace technology.  As a technical product manager, I drive product strategy and execution for various features and services on our platform.

history.title: Product Engineering
history.description: At the historied retailer, I was a member of the ecommerce team that delivered modern solutions for JCrew’s online B2C sales channel.  I helped launch and build a cloud-based API, a new checkout user experience, and various features on the e-commerce platform as a technical product owner and developer.
